channel.title: This whole topic board is rather counter-intuitive?
channel.description:
#3 of TOS for these forums. [code]You do not currently play runescape, or any other Jagex game, and are therefore not subject to their TOS or any other agreement with them.[/code]
Brilliant. By Saying you must not play any jagex games and that Moparscape has a forum designated for Runescape(TM) topics. If a lawsuit were to arise, wouldn't this be a target point?

item.title: This whole topic board is rather counter-intuitive?
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:15, topic:534496”]http://moparisthebest.com/lawstuff

read up kiddos[/quote]
I never saw that before that was quite amusing lol.
It is true though, that all TOS use the clause of “i am not responsible for what my members do” just like if child porn were to appear on jagex’s webpage. they would say “NOT OURS” and give the ip address. Good to know this is all taken care of //closed

Read full topic
item.source: This whole topic board is rather counter-intuitive?

item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:12, topic:534496”][quote author=RS From The 00s link=topic=653294.msg4377628#msg4377628 date=1382529695]
How does MITB get away with hosting the deobs and the Mopar webclient on this server though?
[/quote]
He isn’t running an actual game server (yet) and claims its only for learning[/quote]

He ran a runescape classic server for over a year but it doesn’t matter because the game server is 100% our code.
